title: Riot Kayle issue
body: I haven't received my mystery box or my icon. I wanted to know what happened and if anyone else had this same problem. I've already had riot kayle for some time now and I just want to know whats going on.

replies.body: Per the [announcement](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/thank-you), it's going to take some time to roll out rewards for every eligible account.  Majority of players don't have it yet, and it will be going out in waves.  For example, some players may find that they already have the icon or Kayle unlocked and not the skin- don't worry, everything will be coming in time!  Hang tight.  :D
